item.title: Day 4 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Cross-RQA Quantifying synchronisation and coupling strength Analysis of leader-follower behavior and coupling direction Introduction to recurrence networks Tentative time table for Day 2 When What Who Topics Notes 09.00-10.30 Quantifying interaction dynamics of coupled systems FH Cross-RQA 10.30-11.00 Coffee/Tea 11.00-12.00 Assignments Cross-RQA, Diagonal recurrence profiles, Surrogate analysis 12.
